chapter.title: Localization
chapter.para:
The API supports localization of error messages and other content returned as part of a HTTP response. A client can request that content be localized into a particular language by providing the Accept-Language header with a request.
The Accept-Language header is described in section 14.4 of RFC 2616
The Accept-Language header allows languages to be identified by standard tags.
The format for language tags is described in RFC 1766
